item.description:
First off, I apologize for the delay between meetings. I've reached out to the people at NERD to book another space, so hopefully we'll have our first 'Mini-Topic' meetup very soon.

In the meantime, I suggest another 'Pub Night'. As an added incentive, we'll have a special guest: Dave Klein (author of "Grails: A Quick-Start Guide") is in town, and there's been some interest in meeting up with him.
As for venue, I propose we meet at the Thirsty Scholar in Central Square. If anyone has any strong objections, please let me know and we can reschedule.


I think it'll be a good time; come join us!
item.how_to_find_us: I'll try and bring a sign, but take a look at some of the photos of us up here on the site.
item.name: Informal Pub Night
